Text:
You just need something like this:

    char msb = ...; // read MSB
    char lsb = ...; // read LSB
    int val = (msb << 8) | lsb; // combine MSB and LSB to make an int

You just need something like this:

    unsigned char msb = ...; // read MSB
    unsigned char lsb = ...; // read LSB
    int val = (msb << 8) | lsb; // combine MSB and LSB to make an int
